metadata.title: CVE-2023-41887 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: OpenRefine is a powerful free, open source tool for working with messydata. Prior to version 3.7.5, a remote code execution vulnerability allowsany unauthenticated user to execute code on the server. Version 3.7.5 has apatch for this issue.

criterions.comment: openrefine package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
